name: CxD Portfolio Presentation Template
description:
The ultimate Conversation Design portfolio presentation template, a.k.a. how to pass your next panel interview for design specific jobs!


Your portfolio presentation or the “portfolio walkthrough” is a tool for you to tell everyone on the hiring team who you are, what aspects of CxD make up your design philosophy, and what kind of projects you’ve worked on. I've included a few bits & pieces from my own portfolio (tried, tested, and verified!) to help you create yours :)
